title: Add polly bot source + auto-deploy workflow
author: Itachi-1824

gist.headline: Polly moves in
gist.blurb: Our Discord bot Polly has moved into the main monorepo. Her source code is now cozy in `apps/polly` with a shiny new auto-deploy pipeline.
gist.summary: Migrated the Polly Discord bot source code into the monorepo and established an automated deployment workflow via GitHub Actions.
gist.impact: Centralizes development and ensures faster, more reliable updates for the community Discord bot.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee moving into a new digital home (folder structure), unpacking code with the help of the monitor robot.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot with a yellow body and dark brown horizontal stripes, small black legs, two black antennae, black vertical oval eyes, bright pink rectangular blush marks on cheeks, a small happy smile, and small rounded light blue translucent wings. She is unpacking digital boxes in a new room. A chunky robot helper sets up a retro terminal glowing lime green (#ecf874). Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. The bee wears a tiny tool belt. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Pixel text: 'POLLY SOURCE'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
